§ 24304. Employee stock ownership plans In issuing stock pursuant to applicable corporate law, Amtrak is encouraged to include employee stock ownership plans. (Pub. L. 103–272, § 1(e), July 5, 1994, 108 Stat. 908; Pub. L. 105–134, title IV, § 415(a)(1), Dec. 2, 1997, 111 Stat. 2590.)
